meanings.definition: Moving, operating, or happening at a greater speed than something else.
meanings.sent1: The cheetah is faster than the turtle.
meanings.sent2: She ran faster than her friend in the race.
meanings.sent3: The snail challenged the rabbit to a race to see who could be faster.
meanings.sent4: His mind worked faster than a supercomputer, solving problems in seconds.
meanings.sent5: The rocket ship moved faster than anyone had ever seen, leaving a trail of light behind.

meanings.definition: In a quicker or more rapid manner.
meanings.sent1: She completed the puzzle faster than anyone else.
meanings.sent2: He typed faster on the keyboard to finish his essay on time.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel climbed the tree faster than a speeding bullet.
meanings.sent4: Time flew by faster than expected during the fun-filled party.
meanings.sent5: The river flowed faster after the heavy rain, carrying debris downstream swiftly.
